productfeatures: Face Detection, Image Stabilization, Panorama Mode
dimensions: 3.4 inches high x 4.8 inches wide x 4.6 inches deep
label9: Full HD videos up to 1920 x 1080i at 60fps
label1: The EVF has a 201k dot resolution and a built-in eye sensor. The EVF enables eye level shooting, which provides an additional point of contact to better aid in steadying your camera while shooting.
label4: 2x intelligent digital zoom and can effectively double the zoom magnification to 80x
label5: Lens shift type optical image stabilization
focusingtype: Active Auto, Active Infra-Red Auto, Manual, Manual/Automatic, Passive Auto, TTL Contrast Detection
zoom: Fujinon 40x optical zoom lens, giving a 35mm equivalent focal length range of 24-960mm
resolution: The 16 megapixel 1/2.3-inch Backside Illuminated CMOS sensor is able to deliver high resolution imagery with tremendous quality and notable low light performance
display: Equipped with both a rear 3-inch 460k dot LCD monitor and an eye level electronic viewfinder for monitoring and reviewing imagery
